title: [Neuroscience] Stable Memory Test Scores for Alzheimer’s Patients with Omega-3 Intake. Small scale study reveals Omega 3 supplements stabilized memory function in adults with Alzheimer’s disease. Those who did not take omega-3 supplements showed a deterioration in memory function.

[Health] Gut bacteria may reduce drug effectiveness. These interactions, seen for a variety of medications, such as depression, diabetes, and asthma drugs, could help researchers to better understand individual differences in drug effectiveness and side-effects.
